     <path d="M107.941,69.169c-1.261,0-2.352-0.943-2.506-2.227c-0.165-1.386,0.824-2.643,2.209-2.809l32.473-3.882
		c1.364-0.166,2.643,0.823,2.81,2.209c0.165,1.385-0.824,2.643-2.21,2.809l-32.473,3.883
		C108.144,69.163,108.042,69.169,107.941,69.169z" fill="currentcolor">
     </path>
    </g>
   </symbol>
   <symbol id="adopt" viewbox="0 0 150 150">
    <g>
     <path d="M145.077,64.658L76.006,13.937c-1.26-0.924-2.978-0.915-4.225,0.025L4.747,64.428
		c-1.562,1.176-1.874,3.394-0.698,4.956c1.175,1.562,4.253,1.875,5.815,0.698L19,63.853v64.7c0,1.955-0.286,3.447,1.668,3.447
		H129.19c1.954,0,4.81-1.492,4.81-3.447V64.479l7.451,5.883c0.633,0.464,1.083,0.687,1.812,0.687c1.087,0,2.02-0.5,2.713-1.444
		C147.132,68.029,146.653,65.815,145.077,64.658z M126,125H25V58.525l49.358-37.327L126,59.281V125z" fill="currentcolor">
     </path>
     <path d="M105.907,76.018c0-8.638-7.003-15.641-15.642-15.641c-7.523,0-13.803,5.315-15.297,12.396
		c-1.496-7.081-7.774-12.396-15.299-12.396c-8.639,0-15.614,6.934-15.641,15.572c-0.045,14.07,31.008,37.223,31.008,37.223
		S105.907,89.382,105.907,76.018z" fill="currentcolor">
     </path>
    </g>
   </symbol>
  </svg>
  <a class="visually-hidden focusable skip-link" href="#main-content">
   Skip to main content
  </a>
  <div class="layout-container ">

      <section class="band flash" role="alert">

      <main role="main">
       <a id="main-content" tabindex="-1">
       </a>
       <section class="band preface">
        <div class="band__inner">
         <div class="l-grid-container">
          <div class="region region-title">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </section>
       <section class="band content">
        <div class="band__inner">
         <div class="l-grid-container">
          <div class="layout-content">
           <div class="region region-content">
            <div class="block block-system block-system-main-block" id="block-mainpagecontent">
             <div class="block__inner">
              <div class="block__content">
               <article class="is_published view-mode--full node node--type-homepage node--view-mode-full layout-one-section">
                <div class="field field-paragraphs field--type-entity-reference-revisions field--label-hidden field__items field-paragraphs__items">
                 <div class="field__item field-paragraphs__item field-paragraphs__item--billboard">
                  <div class="field-content">
                   <div class="billboard paragraph paragraph--type--billboard paragraph--view-mode--default view-mode--default bg-img">
                    <div class="paragraph--inner">
                     <ul class="bg_imgs">
                      <li class="bg-style-pspca_banner" style="background-image: url(https://www.pspca.org/sites/default/files/styles/pspca_banner/public/2018-05/Officer%20Smith%202.jpg?h=bfa41935&amp;itok=A6obtlL1&amp;h=1529198882);">
                      </li>
                     </ul>
                     <div class="field field-image field--type-image field--label-hidden field__item field-image__item">
                      <div class="field-content">
                       <img alt="PSPCA Humane Law Enforcement" class="image-style-pspca-banner" height="580" src="/sites/default/files/styles/pspca_banner/public/2018-05/Officer%20Smith%202.jpg?h=bfa41935&amp;itok=A6obtlL1" typeof="foaf:Image" width="1400"/>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                     <h2 class="title field-title__title">
                      <span class="text">
                       PSPCA Humane Law Enforcement Ride Along
                      </span>
                     </h2>
                     <div class="field field-body field--type-text-with-summary field--label-hidden field__item">
                      <div class="field-content">
                       <h4>
                        CBS3 profiles our officers on the front line of fight against animal cruelty.
                        <br/>
                        PSPCA continues promise that help is on the way.
                       </h4>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                     <div class="field field-link field--type-link field--label-hidden field__item">
                      <div class="field-content">
                       <a class=" button" href="https://www.pspca.org/pspca-ride-along-shows-front-line-fighting-against-animal-cruelty">
                        <span class="text">
                         Watch now
                        </span>
                       </a>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <div class="field__item field-paragraphs__item field-paragraphs__item--sign_posts">
                  <div class="field-content">
                   <div class="sign_posts paragraph paragraph--type--sign-posts paragraph--view-mode--default view-mode--default">
                    <div class="field field-sign-posts field--type-entity-reference field--label-hidden field__items field-sign-posts__items">
                     <div class="field__item field-sign-posts__item">
                      <div class="field-content">
                       <article class="view-mode--full block-content block-content--type-sign-post block-content--view-mode-full layout-one-section">
                        <div class="field field-signpost-icon field--type-signpost-icon field--label-hidden field__item field-signpost-icon__item">
                         <div class="field-content">
                          <a href="/adopt">
                           <svg class="icon">
                            <use xlink:href="https://www.pspca.org/sites/default/files/svg/0fe9233936535d34a6d1fea87d9de990.svg#adopt" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">
                            </use>
                           </svg>
                          </a>
                         </div>
                        </div>
                        <h2 class="title field-title__title">
                         <span class="text">
                          <a href="/adopt">
                           Adopt
                          </a>
                         </span>
                        </h2>
                        <div class="field field-overview field--type-string-long field--label-hidden field__item field-overview__item">
                         <div class="field-content">
                          Animals come in to our shelter every day looking for a fresh start. Take a look at those currently available, and check back often!
                          <br/>
                          We would love to help you meet the perfect companion.
                         </div>
                        </div>
                       </article>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                     <div class="field__item field-sign-posts__item">
                      <div class="field-content">
                       <article class="view-mode--full block-content block-content--type-sign-post block-content--view-mode-full layout-one-section">
                        <div class="field field-signpost-icon field--type-signpost-icon field--label-hidden field__item field-signpost-icon__item">
                         <div class="field-content">
                          <a href="/veterinary-care">
                           <svg class="icon">
                            <use xlink:href="https://www.pspca.org/sites/default/files/svg/0fe9233936535d34a6d1fea87d9de990.svg#bandaid" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">
                            </use>
                           </svg>
                          </a>
                         </div>
                        </div>
                        <h2 class="title field-title__title">
                         <span class="text">
                          <a href="/veterinary-care">
                           Veterinary Care
                          </a>
                         </span>
                        </h2>
                        <div class="field field-overview field--type-string-long field--label-hidden field__item field-overview__item">
                         <div class="field-content">
                          We offer high-quality, low-cost veterinary care options that make it easier to care for your pet. Check out our full range of services and pricing.
                         </div>
                        </div>
                       </article>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                     <div class="field__item field-sign-posts__item">
                      <div class="field-content">
                       <article class="view-mode--full block-content block-content--type-sign-post block-content--view-mode-full layout-one-section">
                        <div class="field field-signpost-icon field--type-signpost-icon field--label-hidden field__item field-signpost-icon__item">
                         <div class="field-content">
                          <a href="/fight-cruelty">
                           <svg class="icon">
                            <use xlink:href="https://www.pspca.org/sites/default/files/svg/0fe9233936535d34a6d1fea87d9de990.svg#police_shield" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">
                            </use>
                           </svg>
                          </a>
                         </div>
                        </div>
                        <h2 class="title field-title__title">
                         <span class="text">
                          <a href="/fight-cruelty">
                           End Animal Cruelty
                          </a>
                         </span>
                        </h2>
                        <div class="field field-overview field--type-string-long field--label-hidden field__item field-overview__item">
                         <div class="field-content">
                          For 150 years, we have been rescuing animals from cruelty and neglect. Join our mission to end animal cruelty today.
                         </div>
                        </div>
                       </article>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <div class="field__item field-paragraphs__item field-paragraphs__item--impact_banner">
                  <div class="field-content">
                   <article class="view-mode--default impact_banner paragraph paragraph--type-impact-banner paragraph--view-mode-default layout-one-section">
                    <h2 class="title field-title__title">
                     <span class="text">
                      Join our mission, become an advocate.
                     </span>
                    </h2>
                    <div class="field field-body field--type-text-with-summary field--label-hidden field__item">
                     <div class="field-content">
                      <p>
                       We are committed to ouranimals for life. We treat each oneas the individual that they are and provide whatever care necessary to give them the new start they deserve. Help us save more animals in need this year.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="field field-cta-links field--type-link field--label-hidden field__items">
                     <div class="field__item">
                      <div class="field-content">
                       <a class=" " href="/donate">
                        <span class="text">
                         Donate
                        </span>
                       </a>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                   </article>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <div class="field__item field-paragraphs__item field-paragraphs__item--mosaic">
                  <div class="field-content">
                   <div class="mosaic paragraph paragraph--type--mosaic paragraph--view-mode--default view-mode--default">
                    <div class="field field-content field--type-entity-reference field--label-hidden field__items field-content__items">
                     <div class="field__item field-content__item">
                      <div class="field-content">
                       <div class="is_published view-mode--featured node node--type-page node--view-mode-featured layout-tile tile" typeof="schema:WebPage">
                        <a class="layout-tile__bounds tile__bounds" href="/cruelty">
                         <div class="tile__inner layout-tile__inner">
                          <div class="field field-image field--type-image field--label-hidden field__item field-image__item">
                           <div class="field-content">
                            <img alt="Officer Martinez carries out two puppies from neglect" class="image-style-tile" height="250" src="/sites/default/files/styles/tile/public/2018-01/Officer%20Martinez%20with%20Puppies.jpg?h=ef708398&amp;itok=PQDTtCjP" typeof="foaf:Image" width="375"/>
                           </div>
                          </div>
                          <ul class="bg-box">
                           <li class="bg-style-tile" style="background-image: url(https://www.pspca.org/sites/default/files/styles/tile/public/2018-01/Officer%20Martinez%20with%20Puppies.jpg?h=ef708398&amp;itok=PQDTtCjP&amp;h=1529198882);">
                           </li>
                          </ul>
                          <div class="field node-title field--type-ds field--label-hidden field__item node-title__item">
                           <div class="field-content">
                            <h3>
                             Report Animal Cruelty
                            </h3>
                           </div>
                          </div>
                         </div>
                        </a>
                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                     <div class="field__item field-content__item">
                      <div class="field-content">
                       <div class="is_published view-mode--featured node node--type-page node--view-mode-featured layout-tile tile" typeof="schema:WebPage">
                        <a class="layout-tile__bounds tile__bounds" href="/adoptdogs">
                         <div class="tile__inner layout-tile__inner">
                          <div class="field field-image field--type-image field--label-hidden field__item field-image__item">
                           <div class="field-content">
                            <img alt="Brown pitbull smiles while wearing a bow and a tutu" class="image-style-tile" height="250" src="/sites/default/files/styles/tile/public/2017-07/34719489134_2eb736aab8_o.jpg?h=2edb335a&amp;itok=r0Edd34t" typeof="foaf:Image" width="375"/>
                           </div>
                          </div>
                          <ul class="bg-box">
                           <li class="bg-style-tile" style="background-image: url(https://www.pspca.org/sites/default/files/styles/tile/public/2017-07/34719489134_2eb736aab8_o.jpg?h=2edb335a&amp;itok=r0Edd34t&amp;h=1529198882);">
                           </li>
                          </ul>
                          <div class="field node-title field--type-ds field--label-hidden field__item node-title__item">
                           <div class="field-content">
                            <h3>
                             Find Adoptable Dogs
                            </h3>
                           </div>
                          </div>
                         </div>
                        </a>
                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                     <div class="field__item field-content__item">
                      <div class="field-content">
                       <div class="is_published view-mode--featured node node--type-page node--view-mode-featured layout-tile tile" typeof="schema:WebPage">
                        <a class="layout-tile__bounds tile__bounds" href="/adoptcats">
                         <div class="tile__inner layout-tile__inner">
                          <div class="field field-image field--type-image field--label-hidden field__item field-image__item">
                           <div class="field-content">
                            <img alt="Tabby cat " class="image-style-tile" height="250" src="/sites/default/files/styles/tile/public/2018-01/38795646774_9d83bbaaab_o_0.jpg?h=2cfee321&amp;itok=iKjfcpJx" typeof="foaf:Image" width="375"/>
                           </div>
                          </div>
                          <ul class="bg-box">
                           <li class="bg-style-tile" style="background-image: url(https://www.pspca.org/sites/default/files/styles/tile/public/2018-01/38795646774_9d83bbaaab_o_0.jpg?h=2cfee321&amp;itok=iKjfcpJx&amp;h=1529198882);">
                           </li>
                          </ul>
                          <div class="field node-title field--type-ds field--label-hidden field__item node-title__item">
                           <div class="field-content">
                            <h3>
                             Find Adoptable Cats
                            </h3>
                           </div>
                          </div>
                         </div>
                        </a>
                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                     <div class="field__item field-content__item">
                      <div class="field-content">
                       <div class="is_published view-mode--featured node node--type-page node--view-mode-featured layout-tile tile" typeof="schema:WebPage">
                        <a class="layout-tile__bounds tile__bounds" href="/vaccine-clinics">
                         <div class="tile__inner layout-tile__inner">
                          <div class="field field-image field--type-image field--label-hidden field__item field-image__item">
                           <div class="field-content">

                           </div>
                          </div>
                          <ul class="bg-box">
                           <li class="bg-style-tile" style="background-image: url(https://www.pspca.org/sites/default/files/styles/tile/public/2017-10/37031109154_0ea13febfe_o.jpg?h=984ccefa&amp;itok=L7qY6M6z&amp;h=1529198882);">
                           </li>
                          </ul>
                          <div class="field node-title field--type-ds field--label-hidden field__item node-title__item">

                             Vaccine Clinics

                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                     <div class="field__item field-content__item">
                      <div class="field-content">
                       <div class="is_published view-mode--featured node node--type-page node--view-mode-featured layout-tile tile" typeof="schema:WebPage">
                        <a class="layout-tile__bounds tile__bounds" href="/foster">
                         <div class="tile__inner layout-tile__inner">

                           </div>
                          </div>
                          <ul class="bg-box">
                           <li class="bg-style-tile" style="background-image: url(https://www.pspca.org/sites/default/files/styles/tile/public/2018-01/35436043116_0bc8818aa1_o.jpg?h=20b9443b&amp;itok=9OucpXT4&amp;h=1529198882);">
                           </li>
                          </ul>

                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                     <div class="field__item field-content__item">
                      <div class="field-content">
                       <div class="is_published view-mode--featured node node--type-page node--view-mode-featured layout-tile tile" typeof="schema:WebPage">

                           </div>
                          </div>
                          <ul class="bg-box">
